actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Jean Lafitte National Park in the State of Louisiana.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Jean Lafitte National Park in Louisiana. Establishes the Jean Lafitte National Park Commission to advise the Secretary of the Interior on general policies and specific matters related to the planning, adminstration, and development of such park.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Jean Lafitte National Park in the State of Louisiana.
